5thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Antilife Shell
5thLevelDruidSpells.Description: A shimmering barrier extends out from you in a 10-foot radius and moves with you, remaining centered on you and hedging out creatures other than undead and constructs.

5thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Awaken
5thLevelDruidSpells.Description: After spending the casting time tracing magical pathways within a precious gemstone, you touch a huge or smaller beast or plant.

5thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Commune with Nature
5thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You briefly become one with nature and gain knowledge of the surrounding territory.

5thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Conjure Elemental
5thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You call forth an elemental servant.

5thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Geas
5thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You place a magical command on a creature that you can see within range, forcing it to carry out some service or refrain from some action or course of activity as you decide.

5thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Greater Restoration
5thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You imbue a creature you touch with positive energy to undo a debilitating effect.

5thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Insect Plague
5thLevelDruidSpells.Description: Swarming, biting locusts fill a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range.

5thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Mass Cure Wounds
5thLevelDruidSpells.Description: A wave of healing energy washes out from a point of your choice within range.

5thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Planar Binding
5thLevelDruidSpells.Description: With this spell, you attempt to bind a celestial, an elemental, a fey, or a fiend to your service.

5thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Reincarnate
5thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You touch a dead humanoid or a piece of a dead humanoid.

5thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Scrying
5thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You can see and hear a particular creature you choose that is on the same plane of existence as you.

5thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Tree Stride
5thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You gain the ability to enter a tree and move from inside it to inside another tree of the same kind within 500 feet.

5thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Wall of Stone
5thLevelDruidSpells.Description: A nonmagical wall of solid stone springs into existence at a point you choose within range.
